title: Ticket #272: condor_vm_vmware.pl language dependent (bug on German system)
description:
From condor-users:

Hi all,

thanks a lot for the help. The problem with server 1.0.7 was that I use a germen version of windows xp, and the install path is "C:\Programme\..." instead of "C:\Program files\..." When I change condor_vm_vmware.pl accordingly, the vm universe job starts.

Regards

Wolfgang
